Texts.Chs:
通过单击网格上的图标之一选择研究选项。
你可以通过拖动鼠标左键进行网格导航。
 
- 屏幕上方最左侧的按钮可以打开要搜索的研究树列表
 
- 第二个按钮可打开非隐藏的研究选项的列表。单击显示的研究以使视图居中，再次单击以隐藏列表。
 
- 第三个按钮将视图置于树或当前选定研究的中央。
 
- 最后一个按钮用于切换^orange;低质量模式^reset;。这会使GUI跳转到某个位置，而不是平移到该位置或中间按钮。此外，只有在释放鼠标按钮之后，主屏幕上的拖动/导航才会更新。最好在启用此模式的情况下使用搜索列表。
Texts.Eng:
Select a research by clicking one of the icons on the grid.
You can navigate the grid by dragging with the left mouse button.

- The left most button at the upper part of the screen opens a list of research trees to pick from.

- The second button opens a list of non-hidden research options. Click a research on the displayed to center the view on it. Click again to hide the list.

- The third button will center the view on the middle of the tree, or the currently selected research.

- The last button toggles ^orange;low quality mode^reset;. This makes the GUI jump to a position instead of panning to it, or the center button. In addition, dragging/navigating on the the main screen will update only after you release the mouse button. It is best to use the search list with this mode enabled.
